21.fullDescription:
A possible integer overflow exists in the function `sendCoin(address,uint256)`.
The addition or multiplication may result in a value higher than the maximum representable integer.
21.name: ArithmeticVulnerability

fullDescription.text:
A possible integer overflow exists in the function `sendCoin(address,uint256)`.
The addition or multiplication may result in a value higher than the maximum representable integer.
